title: Nikita Khrushchev at Disneyland
subtitle: Rumor: Soviet Premier Nikita Khrushchev was denied permission to visit Disneyland during a state visit to the U.S. in 1959.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Soviet Premier Nikita Khrushchev was denied permission to visit Disneyland during a state visit to the U.S. in 1959.
